name: gaussian-view

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: gaussian-src
variants.description: Use gaussian-src instead of gaussian (prebuilt binary)

description:
GaussView 6 is the latest iteration of a graphical interface used with
Gaussian. It aids in the creation of Gaussian input files, enables the
user to run Gaussian calculations from a graphical interface without the
need for using a command line instruction, and helps in the
interpretation of Gaussian output. Needs post-install steps to make it
run! See package installation logs for details.

dependencies.name: gaussian
dependencies.description: Gaussian is a computer program for computational chemistry

dependencies.name: gaussian-src
dependencies.description:
Gaussian is a computer program for computational chemistry. This Spack
package builds Gaussian from source. Needs post-install steps to make it
run! See package installation log for details.

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description: Shim package for the core OpenGL library from Apple

dependencies.name: glu
dependencies.description: Shim package for Apple implementation of OpenGL Utility Libray (GLU)

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxrender
dependencies.description: libXrender - library for the Render Extension to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: patchelf
dependencies.description:
PatchELF is a small utility to modify the dynamic linker and RPATH of
ELF executables.
